section.heading: Employees subject to employee conduct standards of Merit Personnel Act.

para.text: Except for those District government employees employed by agencies not subject to Chapter 6 of Title 1 [ยง 1-601.01 et seq.], District government employees who participate in the procurement process shall be subject to the provisions of subchapter XVIII of Chapter 6 of Title 1 [ยง 1-618.01 et seq.].
Participation in the procurement process shall include involvement, either directly or indirectly, in:
The decision, approval, disapproval, recommendation, or preparation of any part of a purchase request;
Influencing the content of any specification or purchase standard;
Any other advisory capacity pertaining to any contract, subcontract, solicitation, or proposal.
